title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: In the ImageAnalyzer example in the build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210(GTK2 only), when opening the example, the scrollbars are enabled. However, when attempting to move them, they do not have any effect. Additionally, when opening a small image, such as an icon, the scrollbars are misleading because they do not do anything.
SR:
1. Open the ImageAnalyzer example in the build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210(GTK2 only).
2. Notice that the scrollbars are enabled.
3. Attempt to move the scrollbars and observe that they do not have any effect.
4. Open a small image, such as an icon, and observe that the scrollbars are just misleading because they do not do anything.
